title: Bug 27106Navigator  uncontrollable flash
description: Bug 27106Navigatoruncontrollable flash Build 20021119.Caught up to UI code.1. Load org.eclipse.ui.tests.5.
OB: Open the above workspace.Expand the first project.The views flashuncontrollably.It appears to be a product of having the org.eclipse.ui.tests loaded.
SR: Create a workspace with two projects containing children.2. Go to the resources view.Collapse each project.3. Select the first project and exit Eclipse.4. Open the above workspace.Expand the first project.The views flashuncontrollably.It appears to be a product of having the org.eclipse.ui.tests loaded.
